
  # Product Configurator Design

  This is a code bundle for Product Configurator Design. The original project is available at https://www.figma.com/design/L0Cb8Tc1srUv36KJ7jUg1U/Product-Configurator-Design.

  ## Running the code

  Run `npm i` to install the dependencies.

  Run `npm run dev` to start the development server.
